snippet: Jennifer J. Raab has created “a culture of fear,” according to one departing assistant dean, but supporters say the college’s fortunes have risen during her tenure.
abstract: Jennifer J Raab, who has led Hunter College as its president for 12 years, is departing under a mixture of unqualified successes during her tenure and attacks on her record from from former administrators who say she ruled under a culture of fear and mistrust.
lead_paragraph: Jennifer J. Raab has created “a culture of fear,” according to one departing assistant dean, but supporters say the college’s fortunes have risen during her tenure.

headline.main: Amid Exits, President of Hunter College Is Assailed for Her Management Style
headline.print_headline: Amid Exits, President of Hunter College Is Assailed for Her Management Style
